column5: System allows login with an invalid username.
column6:
1. Url: https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login
2. Invalid Username: admin
3. Valid Password: admin123
column7:
1. Open Chrome browser
2. Enter URL
3. Enter an invalid username
4. Enter a valid password
5. Click "Login"
column8: User logged in successfully despite invalid username.
column9: User should fail to log in, and an error message: "Invalid credentials" should be displayed.
